name: TwinCAT System Manager Configuration File
summary: Learn about .TSM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: TwinCAT System Manager can configure several types of buses, including USB, serial, Ethernet, EtherCAT, Beckhoff Lightbus, PROFIBUS, ProfiNET, Interbus, CANopen, SERCOS, DeviceNet, PC printer ports, and SMB.

description: Preference file used by TwinCAT System Manager, a PLC (Programmable Logic Controller) management program; stores the configuration for a PLC system, including system relationships, PLC programs, axis control, and connected I/O channels.
